trans-unit.source: Family Ledger is an application for collecting and viewing in-game item data held in World of Warcraft accounts.
trans-unit.target: Family Ledger是一款用于收集和查看魔兽世界帐户中包含的游戏内物品数据的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: ledger: a pure command line program that outputs tabular data to file or to console. Available output file formats include Excel, CSV and TSV.
trans-unit.target: ledger：一个纯命令行程序，可将表格数据输出到文件或控制台。可用的输出文件格式包括Excel，CSV和TSV。

trans-unit.source: ledger_web: a program that starts a local web service so you can view and refresh item data immediately in your web browser.
trans-unit.target: ledger_web：启动本地Web服务的程序，因此您可以立即在Web浏览器中查看和刷新项目数据。

trans-unit.source: Family Ledger is an application for collecting and viewing in-game item data held in World of Warcraft accounts.
trans-unit.target: Family Ledger是一款用于收集和查看《魔兽世界》账户中持有的游戏内物品数据的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: It has only been tested with vanilla World of Warcraft patch 1.12 at this time.
trans-unit.target: 目前只用香草魔兽世界1.12补丁进行了测试。
请参阅完整的文档，网址为：https : //familyledger.readthedocs.io

trans-unit.source: There are actually two programs (scripts) for this application:
trans-unit.target: 其实这个应用有两个程序(脚本)。
